mapper.select: SELECT sum(num) n,t from (SELECT 1 num,0 n1,DATE_FORMAT(time,'%Y-%m-%d') t from orders o where o.status in (2,3,4) and time <= #{end} and time >= #{start} UNION ALL SELECT 0 num, @num :=@num + 1 n1, date_format( adddate( #{start}, INTERVAL @num DAY ), '%Y-%m-%d' ) t FROM user, (SELECT @num := 0) t WHERE adddate( #{start}, INTERVAL @num DAY ) <= date_format(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY t )s GROUP BY t
